item.title: ‘King of the Hill’ Stars on Reboot Voice Cast Changes and Honoring Their Departed Friends
item.description: Stephen Root, Lauren Tom and Toby Huss discuss releasing the animated reboot in a changing TV landscape and how the show handles the absence of characters differently, with on-screen credit tributes t
